snippet: Israeli warplanes struck two areas near Damascus, Syrian officials say, targeting weaponry believed to be destined for Hezbollah in Lebanon.
abstract: Syrian official say Israeli warplanes struck two areas near Damascus, apparently ending monthslong hiatus in strikes attributed to Israel against weaponry destined for Hezbollah in Lebanon.

byline.contributor: Huwaida Saad and Mohammad Ghannam contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: Israeli warplanes struck two areas near Damascus, Syrian officials say, targeting weaponry believed to be destined for Hezbollah in Lebanon.

headline.main: Syria Reports New Strikes From Israel Near Capital
headline.print_headline: Syria Reports New Strikes From Israel Near Capital

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
